#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long long int t;
	cin >>t;
	while(t--){
	    long long int n;
	    cin >> n;
	    if(n==0){
	        cout << "No" << endl;
	    }
	    else if(n%2!=0){
	        cout << "No" << endl;
	    }
	    else{
	        cout << "Yes" << endl;
	    }
	    
	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
